author: Ivan Mehta
title: Amazon and Flipkart will resume delivery of non-essential items in India from April 20
description: Earlier this week, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced the extension of lockdown until May 3 to curb the coronavirus spread. However, new guidelines published by the government suggest that ecommerce companies can start delivering non-essential good…
